{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:difference,
    value:value * 1024 / 600.,
    series:{gid}_{nid}_disk_{bpath}_kbytes_read.gauge,
    alias:Read,
    interval:10m,

target.2 =
    function:difference,
    value:value * 1024 / 600.,
    series:{gid}_{nid}_disk_{bpath}_kbytes_write.gauge,
    alias:Write,
    interval:10m,


cfg.title = Disk Traffic
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 1000px
cfg.stack = false
cfg.fill = 0
cfg.y_format = bytes

}}
